amendment.description: Amendment requires the Register of Copyrights to be capable of identifying and supervising a Chief Information Officer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-95 to require the Register of Copyrights to be capable of identifying and supervising a Chief Information Officer or similar official responsible for managing information technology systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 14 (Roll no. 226).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Deutch.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 14 (Roll no. 226).
